Posts.Content: Hep C has a cure. I understand your concern about big pharma,but we are talking about patient journeys and advocacy here.
Posts.Title: A new collaboration, "Patient Perspectives," to amplify patients' voices

Posts.Content: I couldn’t imagine what it would have cost me, had I not had insurance for my recent heart surgery. Also it being a congenital defect, I could have had this surgery when I was a baby. What would it have cost my parents had they not had insurance. I would love to help with this.
Posts.Title: A new collaboration, "Patient Perspectives," to amplify patients' voices
